00105 /* highly irritating but from RNA we cant know this */
00106 static Nurb *curve_nurb_from_point(Curve *cu, const void *point, int *nu_index, int *pt_index)
00107 {
00108     ListBase *nurbs = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00109     Nurb *nu;
00110     int i = 0;
00111 
00112     for (nu = nurbs->first; nu; nu = nu->next, i++) {
00113         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00114             if (point >= (void *)nu->bezt && point < (void *)(nu->bezt + nu->pntsu)) {
00115                 break;
00116             }
00117         }
00118         else {
00119             if (point >= (void *)nu->bp && point < (void *)(nu->bp + (nu->pntsu * nu->pntsv))) {
00120                 break;
00121             }
00122         }
00123     }
00124 
00125     if (nu) {
00126         if (nu_index) {
00127             *nu_index = i;
00128         }
00129     
00130         if (pt_index) {
00131             if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER)  *pt_index = (int)((BezTriple *)point - nu->bezt);
00132             else                        *pt_index = (int)((BPoint *)point - nu->bp);
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     return nu;
00137 }

00139 static StructRNA *rna_Curve_refine(PointerRNA *ptr)
00140 {
00141     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->data;
00142     short obtype = curve_type(cu);
00143     
00144     if (obtype == OB_FONT) return &RNA_TextCurve;
00145     else if (obtype == OB_SURF) return &RNA_SurfaceCurve;
00146     else return &RNA_Curve;
00147 }

00286 static int rna_Nurb_length(PointerRNA *ptr)
00287 {
00288     Nurb *nu = (Nurb*)ptr->data;
00289     if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) return 0;
00290     return nu->pntsv>0 ? nu->pntsu*nu->pntsv : nu->pntsu;
00291 }

00323 static void rna_Curve_update_points(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00324 {
00325     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00326     Nurb *nu = curve_nurb_from_point(cu, ptr->data, NULL, NULL);
00327 
00328     if (nu)
00329         calchandlesNurb(nu);
00330 
00331     rna_Curve_update_data(bmain, scene, ptr);

00334 static PointerRNA rna_Curve_bevelObject_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00335 {
00336     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00337     Object *ob = cu->bevobj;
00338 
00339     if (ob)
00340         return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_Object, ob);
00341 
00342     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, NULL, NULL);
00343 }
00344 
00345 static void rna_Curve_bevelObject_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00346 {
00347     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00348     Object *ob = (Object*)value.data;
00349 
00350     if (ob) {
00351         /* if bevel object has got the save curve, as object, for which it's */
00352         /* set as bevobj, there could be infinity loop in displist calculation */
00353         if (ob->type == OB_CURVE && ob->data != cu) {
00354             cu->bevobj = ob;
00355         }
00356     }
00357     else {
00358         cu->bevobj = NULL;
00359     }
00360 }
00361 
00362 static int rna_Curve_otherObject_poll(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00363 {
00364     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00365     Object *ob = (Object*)value.data;
00366 
00367     if (ob) {
00368         if (ob->type == OB_CURVE && ob->data != cu) {
00369             return 1;
00370         }
00371     }
00372 
00373     return 0;
00374 }

00404 static void rna_Curve_resolution_u_update_data(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, PointerRNA *ptr)
00405 {
00406     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00407     ListBase *nurbs = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00408     Nurb *nu = nurbs->first;
00409 
00410     while (nu) {
00411         nu->resolu = cu->resolu;
00412         nu = nu->next;
00413     }
00414     
00415     rna_Curve_update_data(bmain, scene, ptr);
00416 }

00458 /* TODO - check UTF & python play nice */
00459 void rna_Curve_body_set(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *value)
00460 {
00461     int len = strlen(value);
00462     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00463 
00464     cu->len = cu->pos = len;
00465 
00466     if (cu->str)
00467         MEM_freeN(cu->str);
00468     if (cu->strinfo)
00469         MEM_freeN(cu->strinfo);
00470 
00471     cu->str = MEM_callocN(len + sizeof(wchar_t), "str");
00472     /* don't know why this is +4, just duplicating load_editText() */
00473     cu->strinfo = MEM_callocN((len+4) *sizeof(CharInfo), "strinfo");
00474 
00475     /*BLI_strncpy_wchar_as_utf8(cu->str, value, len+1);  *//* value is not wchar_t */
00476     BLI_strncpy(cu->str, value, len+1);
00477 }

00480 {

00482

00486     else {
00487         nurbs_knot_calc_u(nu);
00488     }

00490     rna_Curve_update_data(bmain, scene, ptr);

00522 static void rna_Curve_spline_points_add(ID *id, Nurb *nu, ReportList *reports, int number)
00523 {
00524     if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00525         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Bezier spline can't have points added");
00526     }
00527     else if (number == 0) {
00528         /* do nothing */
00529     }
00530     else {
00531 
00532         addNurbPoints(nu, number);
00533 
00534         /* update */
00535         nurbs_knot_calc_u(nu);
00536 
00537         rna_Curve_update_data_id(NULL, NULL, id);
00538     }
00539 }
00540 
00541 static void rna_Curve_spline_bezpoints_add(ID *id, Nurb *nu, ReportList *reports, int number)
00542 {
00543     if (nu->type != CU_BEZIER) {
00544         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Only Bezier splines can be added");
00545     }
00546     else if (number == 0) {
00547         /* do nothing */
00548     }
00549     else {
00550         addNurbPointsBezier(nu, number);
00551 
00552         /* update */
00553         nurbs_knot_calc_u(nu);
00554 
00555         rna_Curve_update_data_id(NULL, NULL, id);
00556     }
00557 }
00558 
00559 static Nurb *rna_Curve_spline_new(Curve *cu, int type)
00560 {
00561     Nurb *nu = (Nurb *) MEM_callocN( sizeof( Nurb ), "spline.new" );
00562 
00563     if (type == CU_BEZIER) {
00564         BezTriple *bezt = (BezTriple *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(BezTriple), "spline.new.bezt");
00565         bezt->radius = 1.0;
00566         nu->bezt = bezt;
00567     }
00568     else {
00569         BPoint *bp = (BPoint *)MEM_callocN(sizeof(BPoint), "spline.new.bp");
00570         bp->radius = 1.0f;
00571         nu->bp = bp;
00572     }
00573 
00574     nu->type = type;
00575     nu->pntsu = 1;
00576     nu->pntsv = 1;
00577 
00578     nu->orderu = nu->orderv = 4;
00579     nu->resolu = nu->resolv = 12;
00580     nu->flag = CU_SMOOTH;
00581 
00582     BLI_addtail(BKE_curve_nurbs(cu), nu);
00583 
00584     return nu;
00585 }
00586 
00587 static void rna_Curve_spline_remove(Curve *cu, ReportList *reports, Nurb *nu)
00588 {
00589     int found = 0;
00590     ListBase *nurbs = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00591 
00592     found = BLI_remlink_safe(nurbs, nu);
00593 
00594     if (!found) {
00595         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Curve \"%s\" does not contain spline given", cu->id.name+2);
00596         return;
00597     }
00598 
00599     freeNurb(nu);
00600     /* invalidate pointer!, no can do */
00601 
00602     DAG_id_tag_update(&cu->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00603     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, NULL);
00604 }
00605 
00606 static void rna_Curve_spline_clear(Curve *cu)
00607 {
00608     ListBase *nurbs = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00609 
00610     freeNurblist(nurbs);
00611 
00612     DAG_id_tag_update(&cu->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00613     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, NULL);
00614 }
00615 
00616 static PointerRNA rna_Curve_active_spline_get(PointerRNA *ptr)
00617 {
00618     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->data;
00619     Nurb *nu;
00620     ListBase *nurbs = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00621 
00622     /* for curve outside editmode will set to -1,  should be changed to be allowed outside of editmode. */
00623     nu = BLI_findlink(nurbs, cu->actnu);
00624 
00625     if (nu)
00626         return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, &RNA_Spline, nu);
00627 
00628     return rna_pointer_inherit_refine(ptr, NULL, NULL);
00629 }
00630 
00631 static void rna_Curve_active_spline_set(PointerRNA *ptr, PointerRNA value)
00632 {
00633     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->data;
00634     Nurb *nu = value.data;
00635     ListBase *nubase = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00636 
00637     /* -1 is ok for an unset index */
00638     if (nu == NULL)
00639         cu->actnu = -1;
00640     else
00641         cu->actnu = BLI_findindex(nubase, nu);
00642 }
00643 
00644 static char *rna_Curve_spline_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00645 {
00646     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00647     ListBase *nubase = BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00648     Nurb *nu = ptr->data;
00649     int index = BLI_findindex(nubase, nu);
00650 
00651     if (index >= 0)
00652         return BLI_sprintfN("splines[%d]", index);
00653     else
00654         return BLI_strdup("");
00655 }
00656 
00657 /* use for both bezier and nurbs */
00658 static char *rna_Curve_spline_point_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00659 {
00660     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00661     Nurb *nu;
00662     void *point = ptr->data;
00663     int nu_index, pt_index;
00664 
00665     nu = curve_nurb_from_point(cu, point, &nu_index, &pt_index);
00666 
00667     if (nu) {
00668         if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00669             return BLI_sprintfN("splines[%d].bezier_points[%d]", nu_index, pt_index);
00670         }
00671         else {
00672             return BLI_sprintfN("splines[%d].points[%d]", nu_index, pt_index);
00673         }
00674     }
00675     else {
00676         return BLI_strdup("");
00677     }
00678 }
00679 
00680 
00681 static char *rna_TextBox_path(PointerRNA *ptr)
00682 {
00683     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00684     TextBox *tb = ptr->data;
00685     int index = (int)(tb - cu->tb);
00686 
00687     if (index >= 0 && index < cu->totbox)
00688         return BLI_sprintfN("text_boxes[%d]", index);
00689     else
00690         return BLI_strdup("");
00691 }
00692 
00693 static void rna_Curve_splines_begin(CollectionPropertyIterator *iter, PointerRNA *ptr)
00694 {
00695     Curve *cu = (Curve*)ptr->id.data;
00696     rna_iterator_listbase_begin(iter, BKE_curve_nurbs(cu), NULL);
00697 }
00698

00701 static void rna_def_bpoint(BlenderRNA *brna)
00702 {
00703     StructRNA *srna;
00704     PropertyRNA *prop;
00705 
00706     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "SplinePoint", NULL);
00707     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "BPoint");
00708     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "SplinePoint", "Spline point without handles");
00709 
00710     /* Boolean values */
00711     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "select", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00712     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "f1", 0);
00713     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Select", "Selection status");
00714     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00715 
00716     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "hide", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00717     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "hide", 0);
00718     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Hide", "Visibility status");
00719     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00720 
00721     /* Vector value */
00722     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "co", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
00723     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
00724     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "vec");
00725     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Point", "Point coordinates");
00726     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, 1, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT);
00727     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00728 
00729     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "weight", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00730     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "vec[3]");
00731     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Weight", "NURBS weight");
00732     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00733 
00734     /* Number values */

00736     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "alfa");
00737     /*RNA_def_property_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX);*/
00738     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tilt", "Tilt in 3D View");
00739     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00740 
00741     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "weight_softbody", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00742     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "weight");
00743     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.01f, 100.0f);
00744     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Weight", "Softbody goal weight");
00745     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00746

00749     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0f, FLT_MAX);
00750     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bevel Radius", "Radius for bevelling");
00751     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00752 
00753     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_Curve_spline_point_path");
00754 }

00842 static void rna_def_path(BlenderRNA *brna, StructRNA *srna)
00843 {
00844     PropertyRNA *prop;
00845     
00846     /* number values */
00847     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "path_duration", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
00848     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "pathlen");
00849     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, MAXFRAME);
00850     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Path Length",
00851                              "The number of frames that are needed to traverse the path, "
00852                              "defining the maximum value for the 'Evaluation Time' setting");
00853     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00854     
00855     /* flags */
00856     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_path", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00857     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_PATH);
00858     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Path", "Enable the curve to become a translation path");
00859     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00860     
00861     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_path_follow", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00862     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_FOLLOW);
00863     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Follow", "Make curve path children to rotate along the path");
00864     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00865     
00866     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_stretch", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00867     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_STRETCH);
00868     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Stretch", "Option for curve-deform: "
00869                              "make deformed child to stretch along entire path");
00870     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00871 
00872     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_deform_bounds", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00873     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_DEFORM_BOUNDS_OFF);
00874     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bounds Clamp", "Option for curve-deform: "
00875                              "Use the mesh bounds to clamp the deformation");
00876     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00877 
00878     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_time_offset", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00879     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_OFFS_PATHDIST);
00880     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Offset Path Distance",
00881                              "Children will use TimeOffs value as path distance offset");
00882     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00883 
00884     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_radius", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
00885     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_PATH_RADIUS);
00886     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Radius", "Option for paths and curve-deform: "
00887                              "apply the curve radius with path following it and deforming");
00888     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00889 }

00902 static void rna_def_font(BlenderRNA *brna, StructRNA *srna)
00903 {
00904     PropertyRNA *prop;
00905     
00906     static EnumPropertyItem prop_align_items[] = {
00907         {CU_LEFT, "LEFT", 0, "Left", "Align text to the left"},
00908         {CU_MIDDLE, "CENTER", 0, "Center", "Center text"},
00909         {CU_RIGHT, "RIGHT", 0, "Right", "Align text to the right"},
00910         {CU_JUSTIFY, "JUSTIFY", 0, "Justify", "Align to the left and the right"},
00911         {CU_FLUSH, "FLUSH", 0, "Flush", "Align to the left and the right, with equal character spacing"},
00912         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00913         
00914     /* Enums */
00915     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "align", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
00916     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "spacemode");
00917     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, prop_align_items);
00918     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Text Align", "Text align from the object center");
00919     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00920     
00921     /* number values */
00922     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00923     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "fsize");
00924     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0001f, 10000.0f);
00925     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0.01, 10, 1, 3);
00926     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Font size", "");
00927     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
00928     
00929     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "small_caps_scale", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
00930     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "smallcaps_scale");
00931     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 1.0, 1, 2);

00933     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");

00982

00984     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "tb", "totbox");
00985     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "TextBox");
00986     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Textboxes", "");
00987

00989     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "actbox");
00990     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "The active text box", "");
00991     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_Curve_active_textbox_index_range");
00992     
00993     /* strings */
00994     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "family", PROP_STRING, PROP_NONE);
00995     RNA_def_property_string_maxlength(prop, MAX_ID_NAME-2);
00996     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Object Font",
00997                              "Use Blender Objects as font characters (give font objects a common name "
00998                              "followed by the character they represent, eg. familya, familyb, etc, "
00999                              "and turn on Verts Duplication)");
01000     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01001

01003     RNA_def_property_string_sdna(prop, NULL, "str");
01004     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Body Text", "Content of this text object");
01005     RNA_def_property_string_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_body_get", "rna_Curve_body_length", "rna_Curve_body_set");
01006     RNA_def_property_string_maxlength(prop, 8192); /* note that originally str did not have a limit! */
01007     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01008 
01009     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "body_format", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01010     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "strinfo", "len");
01011     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "TextCharacterFormat");
01012     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Character Info", "Stores the style of each character");
01013     
01014     /* pointers */
01015     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "follow_curve", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
01016     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "textoncurve");
01017     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, NULL, "rna_Curve_otherObject_poll");
01018     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
01019     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Text on Curve", "Curve deforming text object");
01020     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_deps");
01021

01211 
01212 /* curve.splines */
01213 static void rna_def_curve_splines(BlenderRNA *brna, PropertyRNA *cprop)
01214 {
01215     StructRNA *srna;
01216     PropertyRNA *prop;
01217 
01218     FunctionRNA *func;
01219     PropertyRNA *parm;
01220 
01221     RNA_def_property_srna(cprop, "CurveSplines");
01222     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "CurveSplines", NULL);
01223     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "Curve");
01224     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Curve Splines", "Collection of curve splines");
01225 
01226     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "new", "rna_Curve_spline_new");
01227     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Add a new spline to the curve");
01228     parm = RNA_def_enum(func, "type", curve_type_items, CU_POLY, "", "type for the new spline");
01229     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
01230     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "spline", "Spline", "", "The newly created spline");
01231     RNA_def_function_return(func, parm);
01232 
01233     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "remove", "rna_Curve_spline_remove");
01234     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Remove a spline from a curve");
01235     RNA_def_function_flag(func, FUNC_USE_REPORTS);
01236     parm = RNA_def_pointer(func, "spline", "Spline", "", "The spline to remove");
01237     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED|PROP_NEVER_NULL);
01238 
01239     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "clear", "rna_Curve_spline_clear");
01240     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Remove all spline from a curve");
01241 
01242     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "active", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
01243     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Object");
01244     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_active_spline_get", "rna_Curve_active_spline_set", NULL, NULL);
01245     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
01246     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Active Spline", "Active curve spline");
01247     /* Could call: ED_base_object_activate(C, scene->basact);
01248      * but would be a bad level call and it seems the notifier is enough */
01249     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_ACTIVE, NULL);
01250 }

01252 
01253 static void rna_def_curve(BlenderRNA *brna)
01254 {
01255     StructRNA *srna;
01256     PropertyRNA *prop;
01257     
01258     static EnumPropertyItem curve_twist_mode_items[] = {
01259             {CU_TWIST_Z_UP, "Z_UP", 0, "Z-Up", "Use Z-Up axis to calculate the curve twist at each point"},
01260             {CU_TWIST_MINIMUM, "MINIMUM", 0, "Minimum", "Use the least twist over the entire curve"},
01261             {CU_TWIST_TANGENT, "TANGENT", 0, "Tangent", "Use the tangent to calculate twist"},
01262             {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01263 
01264     static const EnumPropertyItem curve_axis_items[] = {
01265         {0, "2D", 0, "2D", "Clamp the Z axis of the curve"},
01266         {CU_3D, "3D", 0, "3D",
01267                 "Allow editing on the Z axis of this curve, also allows tilt and curve radius to be used"},
01268         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01269             
01270     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Curve", "ID");
01271     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Curve", "Curve datablock storing curves, splines and NURBS");
01272     RNA_def_struct_ui_icon(srna, ICON_CURVE_DATA);
01273     RNA_def_struct_refine_func(srna, "rna_Curve_refine");
01274     
01275     rna_def_animdata_common(srna);
01276 
01277     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "shape_keys", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
01278     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "key");
01279     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Shape Keys", "");
01280 
01281 
01282     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "splines", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01283 #if 0
01284     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "nurb", NULL);
01285 #else
01286     /* this way we get editmode nurbs too, keyframe in editmode */
01287     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_splines_begin", "rna_iterator_listbase_next",
01288                                       "rna_iterator_listbase_end", "rna_iterator_listbase_get",
01289                                       NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01290 #endif
01291     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Spline");
01292     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Splines", "Collection of splines in this curve data object");
01293     rna_def_curve_splines(brna, prop);
01294 
01295     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_handles", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01296     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "drawflag", CU_HIDE_HANDLES);
01297     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Draw Handles", "Display Bezier handles in editmode");
01298     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, NULL);
01299 
01300     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "show_normal_face", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01301     RNA_def_property_boolean_negative_sdna(prop, NULL, "drawflag", CU_HIDE_NORMALS);
01302     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Draw Normals", "Display 3D curve normals in editmode");
01303     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_GEOM|ND_DATA, NULL);
01304 
01305     rna_def_path(brna, srna);
01306     
01307     /* Number values */
01308     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bevel_resolution", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
01309     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "bevresol");
01310     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, 32);
01311     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 32, 1.0, 0);
01312     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bevel Resolution",
01313                              "Bevel resolution when depth is non-zero and no specific bevel object has been defined");
01314     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01315     
01316     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "offset", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE|PROP_UNIT_LENGTH);
01317     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "width");
01318     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -1.0, 1.0, 0.1, 3);
01319     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_offset_get", "rna_Curve_offset_set", NULL);
01320     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Offset", "Offset the curve to adjust the width of a text");
01321     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01322     
01323     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "extrude", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE|PROP_UNIT_LENGTH);
01324     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ext1");
01325     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 100.0, 0.1, 3);
01326     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0.0, FLT_MAX);
01327     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Extrude", "Amount of curve extrusion when not using a bevel object");
01328     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01329     
01330     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bevel_depth", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE|PROP_UNIT_LENGTH);
01331     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ext2");
01332     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 100.0, 0.1, 3);
01333     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bevel Depth", "Bevel depth when not using a bevel object");
01334     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01335     
01336     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "resolution_u", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
01337     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "resolu");
01338     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, SHRT_MAX);
01339     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 1, 64, 1, 0);
01340     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Resolution U", "Surface resolution in U direction");
01341     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_resolution_u_update_data");
01342

01344     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "resolv");
01345     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 1, 64, 1, 0);
01346     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, SHRT_MAX);
01347     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Resolution V", "Surface resolution in V direction");
01348     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_resolution_v_update_data");
01349

01351     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "resolu_ren");
01352     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, SHRT_MAX);

01355                              "Surface resolution in U direction used while rendering (zero skips this property)");

01358     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "resolv_ren");
01359     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 64, 1, 0);
01360     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 0, SHRT_MAX);
01361     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Render Resolution V",
01362                              "Surface resolution in V direction used while rendering (zero skips this property)");
01363     
01364     
01365     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "eval_time", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
01366     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "ctime");
01367     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Evaluation Time",
01368                              "Parametric position along the length of the curve that Objects 'following' it should be "
01369                              "at (position is evaluated by dividing by the 'Path Length' value)");
01370     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01371     
01372     /* pointers */
01373     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bevel_object", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
01374     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Object");
01375     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "bevobj");
01376     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
01377     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bevel Object", "Curve object name that defines the bevel shape");
01378     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_deps");
01379     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_bevelObject_get", "rna_Curve_bevelObject_set", NULL,
01380                                    "rna_Curve_otherObject_poll");
01381 
01382     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "taper_object", PROP_POINTER, PROP_NONE);
01383     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Object");
01384     RNA_def_property_pointer_sdna(prop, NULL, "taperobj");
01385     RNA_def_property_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE);
01386     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Taper Object", "Curve object name that defines the taper (width)");
01387     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_deps");
01388     RNA_def_property_pointer_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_taperObject_get", "rna_Curve_taperObject_set", NULL,
01389                                    "rna_Curve_otherObject_poll");
01390 
01391     /* Flags */
01392 
01393     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "dimensions", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE); /* as an enum */
01394     RNA_def_property_enum_bitflag_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag");
01395     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, curve_axis_items);
01396     RNA_def_property_enum_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Curve_dimension_set", NULL);
01397     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Dimensions", "Select 2D or 3D curve type");
01398     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01399     
01400     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "fill_mode", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
01401     RNA_def_property_enum_bitflag_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag");
01402     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, curve3d_fill_mode_items);
01403     RNA_def_property_enum_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_Curve_fill_mode_itemf");
01404     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Fill Mode", "Mode of filling curve");
01405     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01406 
01407     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "twist_mode", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
01408     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "twist_mode");
01409     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, curve_twist_mode_items);
01410     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Twist Method", "The type of tilt calculation for 3D Curves");
01411     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01412 
01413     /* XXX - would be nice to have a better way to do this, only add for testing. */
01414     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "twist_smooth", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_NONE);
01415     RNA_def_property_float_sdna(prop, NULL, "twist_smooth");
01416     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 0, 100.0, 1, 2);
01417     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Twist Smooth", "Smoothing iteration for tangents");
01418     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01419 
01420     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_fill_deform", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01421     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_DEFORM_FILL);
01422     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Fill Deformed", "Fill curve after applying shape keys and all modifiers");
01423     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01424 
01425     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_fill_caps", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01426     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_FILL_CAPS);
01427     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Fill Caps", "Fill caps for bevelled curves");
01428     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01429 
01430     /* texture space */
01431     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_auto_texspace", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01432     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "texflag", CU_AUTOSPACE);
01433     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Auto Texture Space",
01434                              "Adjust active object's texture space automatically when transforming object");
01435     RNA_def_property_update(prop, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, "rna_Curve_texspace_set");
01436 
01437     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texspace_location", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_TRANSLATION);
01438     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
01439     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Space Location", "Texture space location");
01440     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, 1, RNA_TRANSLATION_PREC_DEFAULT);
01441     RNA_def_property_editable_func(prop, "rna_Curve_texspace_editable");
01442     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_texspace_loc_get", "rna_Curve_texspace_loc_set", NULL);
01443     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01444     
01445     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "texspace_size", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_XYZ);
01446     RNA_def_property_array(prop, 3);
01447     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Space Size", "Texture space size");
01448     RNA_def_property_editable_func(prop, "rna_Curve_texspace_editable");
01449     RNA_def_property_float_funcs(prop, "rna_Curve_texspace_size_get", "rna_Curve_texspace_size_set", NULL);
01450     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01451     
01452     /* not supported yet */
01453 #if 0
01454     prop= RNA_def_property(srna, "texspace_rot", PROP_FLOAT, PROP_EULER);
01455     RNA_def_property_float(prop, NULL, "rot");
01456     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Texture Space Rotation", "Texture space rotation");

01459 #endif
01460     
01461     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_uv_as_generated", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01462     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_UV_ORCO);
01463     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Use UV for mapping", "Uses the UV values as Generated textured coordinates");
01464     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01465     
01466     /* materials */
01467     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "materials", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01468     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "mat", "totcol");
01469     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "Material");
01470     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Materials", "");
01471     RNA_def_property_srna(prop, "IDMaterials"); /* see rna_ID.c */
01472     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, "rna_IDMaterials_assign_int");
01473 }
01474 
01475 static void rna_def_curve_nurb(BlenderRNA *brna)
01476 {
01477     static EnumPropertyItem spline_interpolation_items[] = {
01478         {KEY_LINEAR, "LINEAR", 0, "Linear", ""},
01479         {KEY_CARDINAL, "CARDINAL", 0, "Cardinal", ""},
01480         {KEY_BSPLINE, "BSPLINE", 0, "BSpline", ""},
01481         {KEY_CU_EASE, "EASE", 0, "Ease", ""}, /* todo, define somewhere, not one of BEZT_IPO_* */
01482         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
01483 
01484     StructRNA *srna;
01485     PropertyRNA *prop;
01486 
01487     srna = RNA_def_struct(brna, "Spline", NULL);
01488     RNA_def_struct_sdna(srna, "Nurb");
01489     RNA_def_struct_ui_text(srna, "Spline",
01490                            "Element of a curve, either NURBS, Bezier or Polyline or a character with text objects");
01491 
01492     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "points", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01493     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "bp", NULL);
01494     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "SplinePoint");
01495     RNA_def_property_collection_funcs(prop, "rna_BPoint_array_begin", "rna_iterator_array_next",
01496                                       "rna_iterator_array_end", "rna_iterator_array_get", "rna_Nurb_length",
01497                                       NULL, NULL, NULL);
01498     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Points", "Collection of points that make up this poly or nurbs spline");
01499     rna_def_curve_spline_points(brna, prop);
01500 
01501     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "bezier_points", PROP_COLLECTION, PROP_NONE);
01502     RNA_def_property_struct_type(prop, "BezierSplinePoint");
01503     RNA_def_property_collection_sdna(prop, NULL, "bezt", "pntsu");
01504     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bezier Points", "Collection of points for Bezier curves only");
01505     rna_def_curve_spline_bezpoints(brna, prop);
01506 
01507     
01508     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "tilt_interpolation", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
01509     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "tilt_interp");
01510     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, spline_interpolation_items);
01511     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Tilt Interpolation", "The type of tilt interpolation for 3D, Bezier curves");
01512     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01513 
01514     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "radius_interpolation", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
01515     RNA_def_property_enum_sdna(prop, NULL, "radius_interp");
01516     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, spline_interpolation_items);
01517     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Radius Interpolation", "The type of radius interpolation for Bezier curves");
01518     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01519 
01520     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "type", PROP_ENUM, PROP_NONE);
01521     RNA_def_property_enum_items(prop, curve_type_items);
01522     RNA_def_property_enum_funcs(prop, NULL, "rna_Nurb_type_set", NULL);
01523     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Type", "The interpolation type for this curve element");
01524     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01525 
01526     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "point_count_u", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01527     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE); /* editing this needs knot recalc*/
01528     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "pntsu");
01529     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Points U", "Total number points for the curve or surface in the U direction");
01530     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01531 
01532     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "point_count_v", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01533     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE); /* editing this needs knot recalc*/
01534     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "pntsv");
01535     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Points V", "Total number points for the surface on the V direction");
01536     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01537 
01538 
01539     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "order_u", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
01540     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "orderu");
01541     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 2, 6);
01542     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Order U",
01543                              "NURBS order in the U direction (for splines and surfaces, higher values "
01544                              "let points influence a greater area)");
01545     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_knot_u");
01546 
01547     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "order_v", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
01548     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "orderv");
01549     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 2, 6);
01550     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Order V",
01551                              "NURBS order in the V direction (for surfaces only, higher values "
01552                              "let points influence a greater area)");
01553     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_knot_v");
01554 
01555 
01556     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "resolution_u", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
01557     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "resolu");
01558     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, SHRT_MAX);
01559     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 1, 64, 1, 0);
01560     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Resolution U", "Curve or Surface subdivisions per segment");
01561     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01562 
01563     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "resolution_v", PROP_INT, PROP_NONE);
01564     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "resolv");
01565     RNA_def_property_range(prop, 1, SHRT_MAX);
01566     RNA_def_property_ui_range(prop, 1, 64, 1, 0);
01567     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Resolution V", "Surface subdivisions per segment");
01568     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01569 
01570     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_cyclic_u", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01571     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flagu", CU_NURB_CYCLIC);
01572     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Cyclic U", "Make this curve or surface a closed loop in the U direction");
01573     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_cyclic_u");
01574 
01575     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_cyclic_v", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01576     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flagv", CU_NURB_CYCLIC);
01577     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Cyclic V", "Make this surface a closed loop in the V direction");
01578     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_cyclic_v");
01579 
01580 
01581     /* Note, endpoint and bezier flags should never be on at the same time! */
01582     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_endpoint_u", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01583     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flagu", CU_NURB_ENDPOINT);
01584     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Endpoint U",
01585                              "Make this nurbs curve or surface meet the endpoints in the U direction "
01586                              "(Cyclic U must be disabled)");
01587     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_knot_u");
01588 
01589     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_endpoint_v", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01590     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flagv", CU_NURB_ENDPOINT);
01591     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Endpoint V",
01592                              "Make this nurbs surface meet the endpoints in the V direction "
01593                              "(Cyclic V must be disabled)");
01594     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_knot_v");
01595 
01596     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_bezier_u", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01597     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flagu", CU_NURB_BEZIER);
01598     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bezier U",
01599                              "Make this nurbs curve or surface act like a Bezier spline in the U direction "
01600                              "(Order U must be 3 or 4, Cyclic U must be disabled)");
01601     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_knot_u");
01602 
01603     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_bezier_v", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01604     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flagv", CU_NURB_BEZIER);
01605     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Bezier V",
01606                              "Make this nurbs surface act like a Bezier spline in the V direction "
01607                              "(Order V must be 3 or 4, Cyclic V must be disabled)");
01608     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Nurb_update_knot_v");
01609 
01610 
01611     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "use_smooth", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01612     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "flag", CU_SMOOTH);
01613     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Smooth", "Smooth the normals of the surface or beveled curve");
01614     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01615 
01616     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "hide", PROP_BOOLEAN, PROP_NONE);
01617     RNA_def_property_boolean_sdna(prop, NULL, "hide", 1);
01618     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Hide", "Hide this curve in editmode");
01619     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01620 
01621     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "material_index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01622     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "mat_nr");
01623     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Material Index", "");
01624     RNA_def_property_int_funcs(prop, NULL, NULL, "rna_Curve_material_index_range");
01625     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01626     
01627     prop = RNA_def_property(srna, "character_index", PROP_INT, PROP_UNSIGNED);
01628     RNA_def_property_int_sdna(prop, NULL, "charidx");
01629     RNA_def_property_clear_flag(prop, PROP_EDITABLE); /* editing this needs knot recalc*/
01630     RNA_def_property_ui_text(prop, "Character Index",
01631                              "Location of this character in the text data (only for text curves)");
01632     RNA_def_property_update(prop, 0, "rna_Curve_update_data");
01633 
01634     RNA_def_struct_path_func(srna, "rna_Curve_spline_path");
01635 }
01636 
01637 void RNA_def_curve(BlenderRNA *brna)
01638 {
01639     rna_def_curve(brna);
01640     rna_def_surface(brna);
01641     rna_def_text(brna);
01642     rna_def_textbox(brna);
01643     rna_def_charinfo(brna);
01644     rna_def_bpoint(brna);
01645     rna_def_beztriple(brna);
01646     rna_def_curve_nurb(brna);
01647 }
